headline: Here is Why Amcor (AMCR) is Highly Favored by Hedge Funds
summary: Amcor plc (NYSE:AMCR) is one of the 8 best paper and plastic packaging stocks to buy according to hedge funds. On February 4, Ghansham Panjabi at Baird raised his target price on Amcor plc (NYSE:AMCR) from $50 to $54, resulting in a 12% upside. The analyst also reiterated an Outperform rating on the stock, citing […]
